synopsis.text: The anime "D4DJ First Mix" follows the journey of Rinku Aimoto, a high school student who returns to Japan after living in Africa and enrolls in Yoba Academy, a school where DJ units are all the rage. Rinku's life takes a turn when she encounters Maho Akashi, a fellow student with a passion for DJing. Inspired by Maho and a captivating DJ performance, Rinku forms her own DJ unit with Maho, her childhood friend Muni Oonaruto, and Rei Togetsu, a keyboard player from a wealthy family. As they navigate the competitive world of DJing, Rinku and her friends strive to make their mark while interacting with other renowned DJ units like Peaky P-key and Photon Maidens. With pulse-raising music and a shared dream, the group sets their sights on reaching the top of the DJ scene.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
